text: DYAG (1125 kHz) is a commercial AM radio station owned and operated by Cadiz Radio and TV Network. Its studio and transmitter are located along Santan St., Brgy. Poblacion 2, Sagay, Negros Occidental.HISTORYFire in Paraiso, SagayEllera NPC presidentIloilo-based reporter killed in NegrosReward up for killers, brains in slay of radioman ==References== Category:Radio stations established in 1995 Category:Radio stations in Bacolod
title: DYAG
